text:
Try forcing the `?hs_Lang=en` and add some logic to your login system to redirect to /en or any lang slug you are using.

Regarding the system pages, you will need to mimic your header & footer as global groups following a logic like this:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/code-gallery/entry/founders/gonzalotorreras-hs-multilingual-menu-custom-module>
